excerpt: "Allon Bloch is no stranger to starting companies, but when he launched K Health, he was new to healthcare. Before K Health, Bloch ran website publishing platform Wix and car retailer Vroom, until his father's health struggles inspired him to turn his focus to delivering high quality medicine at scale."
